name: Smartwatch Pro X
description: The latest smartwatch with advanced health tracking, GPS, and waterproof design. Available in Black and Silver.

name: Organic Coffee Beans (500g)
description: Premium organic arabica coffee beans, ethically sourced and roasted to perfection. Rich and smooth flavor profile.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: High-back ergonomic office chair designed for maximum comfort and support during long working hours. Adjustable lumbar support.

name: Bluetooth Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Immersive sound experience with active noise cancellation. Long-lasting battery and comfortable earcups.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with RGB lighting and customizable buttons.

name: Premium Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip premium yoga mat made from eco-friendly TPE material. Perfect for all yoga styles.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p HD security camera with night vision, motion detection, and smartphone app integration.

name: Ceramic Non-Stick Pan Set
description: 3-piece ceramic non-stick pan set. Dishwasher safe and PFOA-free coating.
